channel.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
channel.description:
Holy [b]SHIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b] Report cards are tomorrow, and I am pretty sure overall I did good, but I know I [b]failed french![/b] I probably got a C in math if I am lucky, and I know I probably failed art! As for completing homework, I know I bombed that, and I am almost certain I bombed class participation! What am I gonna do, I'm fucking screwed tomorrow, [b]I NEED IDEAS PL0x, KTHXBAI~....[/b]
*UPDATE* GRADES [b]57 - Art[/b] 69 - Social Studies 81 - Computers 88 - Gym 73 - Science 64 - Language Arts 65 - Math 73 - Electronics (PRACTICAL ARTS) [b]25 - French (FAIL)[/b]

item.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:35, topic:330859”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=427231.msg3138215#msg3138215 date=1267242196]

There’s nothing you can do. It’s your fault for screwing up, so take the punishment. When you enter high school you’ll learn the importance of actually doing work and how easy it really is.

HS work is definitely not easy!
[/quote]

wat, I got high at least twice a day during school. Most of the time I just slept. I never did homework, and I handed in major assignments late everytime (sometimes on the last day of school). And I always had good marks. Often times I had a higher mark then the hardest workers.[/quote]
Depends on what classes you took in which year.

Read full topic

wat, I got high at least twice a day during school. Most of the time I just slept. I never did homework, and I handed in major assignments late everytime (sometimes on the last day of school). And I always had good marks. Often times I had a higher mark then the hardest workers.

item.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:31, topic:330859"][quote author=Frell link=topic=427231.msg3138178#msg3138178 date=1267239489]

Holy SHIT!!! Report cards are tomorrow, and I am pretty sure overall I did good, but I know I failed french! I probably got a C in math if I am lucky, and I know I probably failed art! As for completing homework, I know I bombed that, and I am almost certain I bombed class participation! What am I gonna do, I’m fucking screwed tomorrow, I NEED IDEAS PL0x, KTHXBAI~…

Are you fucking 11? My parents stopped caring what I got on my report card since grade 6.

Your parents might not, but colleges will.
[/quote]
I wasn’t implying that I did bad in school just so you know, I only said that because when I was in grade 6, I got a 51% in physical education, and 49% in French and my parents didn’t seem to give a shit. But of course that all changed when I went into highschool.[/quote]
How the hell do you get a 51% in physical education?-.-

Read full topic

item.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:22, topic:330859”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=427231.msg3137493#msg3137493 date=1267156610]

In 8th grade, I failed one class with a 0%, that same year, I threw a desk at the teacher because she told me to shut up and sit the hell down. That was a fun year.

Lol, if i did that to one of my teachers, all i would here is “Sit, or i’ll go get Mary”

Mary is like a 300LB person who ain’t afraid to sit on ya, rofl.
[/quote]

My mothers name is Mary…

Haha just kidding, sounds like every school needs a Mary though.[/quote]

Lol, shes funny though, def not a shy person at all. Idk though, if every school had a Mary, it wouldn’t make my school soo special for it

Read full topic

item.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Frell:

Coon, don’t you hate it when Spanish teachers claim that the US is bilingual?

Yea, she was one, saying its needed for survival in the US. I couldn’t help myself but to laugh in her face. On-top of that though, she said that we should learn it because of all of the Spanish speaking Americans. I had to ask her "what about if we go to your country, should you learn English? Of course, the expected response “No, you should learn Spanish”

I failed the class with a 15

Read full topic

item.title: Report Cards TOMORROW
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:10, topic:330859”]The only time i have not ‘tried’ in a class, was Spanish. My mom had a ‘argument’ over why we should learn Spanish in america (Teach is mexican). Well, even when actually trying in that class i managed to pull off a 35 for the semester. Thats when my teacher and mom had an arguement, After that i was told “Christobal, go to sleep!”, my spanish name. My IRL name is, well, you can just call me T-Rev.

NO I AM NOT RACIST!

@krackkid - Well, i was told that because im always doing something with models, Until my parents realized that i was better than they thought, and now im going into college for Gaming design & programming.[/quote]
That sounds like a pretty cool type of job :D. I’m aiming to be an actor :3.

Read full topic
